constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 61 (Thursday, April 8, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MURPHY of North Carolina:
H.R. 2422.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H1721]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: To move the April 15, 2021 estimated tax payment deadline to May 17, 2021 for individuals and corporations.
